properties.name: Chen Xiaodao
properties.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.new_detail: They develop silent communication for covert operations
relationships.name: Su Mingyue

relationships.new_detail: Chen confirms Lin's sabotage through compartment evidence
relationships.name: Lin Xiu

events.details: Chen discovers his burn patterns form a perfect map under UV light from his allergy lamp
consequences: Identifies exact spatial coordinates of all hidden temporal nodes
Realizes his body has become a living detector

events.details: Uses garment marking techniques to recreate ship schematics on cleaning tags for Su
Fakes a cleaning supply spill near Lin's quarters to access restricted areas
consequences: Confirms temporal energy readings near Gamma compartment

events.details: Uses UV burns to guide them through distorted corridors avoiding temporal traps
consequences: Chen's body lights up at spatial anomalies
Discovers their path alters based on movement choices

events.details: Identifies the temporal core - an antique passenger pocketwatch embedded in the bulkhead
consequences: Watch face displays countdown matching Chen's burns
Contains miniature versions of all passengers including themselves
